Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires solid waste carting company containers used at curbside to have reflective material
Summary: Requires solid waste carting company containers used at curbside to have a minimum of 72 contiguous square inches of reflective material affixed thereto; provides for a civil penalty of up to $1000 for violations.
LawCode: Add ยง392-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring reflective material on carting company containers
